name: Cursed Ruby
description:
Follow Ruby on her quest to break free from Elias' curse!

UPDATE: There are no mouse controls. Select options in the main menu by using the arrow keys and the jump button

The windows version is what I recommend for the jam, but you can also play on the browser. Mac version is now here too. I can't test it at the moment so I am not sure if it works

NOTE: The spear ability only creates a platform if the spear travels a small distance. It  may be difficult to leave the boss room where you find it due to that. Sorry about this. Should have made a better adjustment for it

Controls (Controller highly recommended!). All buttons assume an XBox controller. 

D-Pad / Arrow Keys: Movement

A Button / Z Key: Jump, Progress dialogue

X Button / X Key: Attack

Y Button / C Key: Spear Projectile (When unlocked)

B Button / A Key: Air Dash (When unlocked)

Start Button / Escape Key: Pause
